attributes.action: Give Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years Torvill and Dean have entertained us with their amazing talent. Around 24 million people watched as they won Gold in 1984 and they are argueably the best ice dancers there has been and ever will be! Their partnership and talent is unmatched and for this they deserve to be knighted.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office Ceremonial Secretariat is now actively seeking direct applications for honours. Please visit http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
